I will be arriving in Paris on Sunday. Can you please provide me the the name of a restaurant which serves French cuisine that open on Sunday? Recommend me the restaurant with the best rating.

I will first find all the restaurants in Paris that serve French cuisine. Then, I will find out which of these are open on Sundays and get their ratings, addresses, and operating hours. Finally, I will recommend the restaurant with the best rating.
